Title: Vim: Demo :mksession (:mks) command
Description:
Demo of Vim :mksession (:mks) command to save and restore opened files; included page-tabs, vertical/horizontal splitted (diff) windows.

References:
* http://stackoverflow.com/questions/1642611/how-to-save-a-session-in-vim
* http://stackoverflow.com/questions/1416572/vi-vim-restore-opened-files
* http://usevim.com/2013/07/05/sessions/
